channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3ftx6ft, 7th June
item.description:
The pothole is getting worse its been there approximately 6months

item.title: Uneven road surface southbound, 7th June
item.description:

item.title: Entire length of brockhampton lane, 5th June
item.description:
The whole length of brockhampton lane is extremely dangerous for cyclists, pedestrians, equestrian and vehicles to use and as a duty of care I request urgent repairs to this section of the public highway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sequence is broken, causing unnecessary tailbacks, 5th June
item.description:
Lights only work every other two cycles, I.e. Red - Red - Green - Red Red - Green etc. This is causing drivers to jump red lights out of frustration, congestion and additional pollution.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Clarence Street, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees hedges, 4th June
item.description:
I’ve driven up dog Lane and trees on both sides repeatedly knocked both door mirrors and scratched the near side. Hedges obviously weren’t cut back over winter
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dog Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
